mean_cn: n.球形把手，旋钮，圆形突出物
mean_en: a round switch on a machine such as a television that you use to turn it on and off, etc.; a round handle on a door or a drawer; a round lump on the surface or end of something; a small lump of something such as butter
sentence: We put the "do not disturb" sign on our door knob, so people know they should stay out.
sentence_trans: 我们把“请勿打扰”的牌子放到了球形门把手上，所以人们知道他们不可以进来。
